moves.39. Nb6: This sets a trap that Black falls for.
moves.40. Nc4+: Forcing the exchange is an easy win.
moves.42. d5:
Other pawn moves also work.

Now if 42... Ke5 43. Kc5 is easy.
moves.42... g6 43. Kd4 g5: This is an easy win for White.  However, one move is aesthetically the best.
moves.44. g4:
Almost any pawn move is winning, and even 44. Kc4 is winning, but 44. g4 puts a stop to the Black pawn advance.

White could have also played 44. g3 preparing 45. f4.
